rohlik_group_l1.summary: Online grocery delivery platform operating across Central Europe. Founded in 2014, headquartered in Prague.

rohlik_group_l2_news.recent_news: Jan 2026: Rohlik expanded automated warehouse in Munich. Oct 2025: Raised Series E of EUR 170M.
rohlik_group_l2_news.funding: Series E EUR 170M in Oct 2025. Total raised over EUR 500M.
rohlik_group_l2_news.leadership_changes: New COO hired in Q3 2025 from Amazon Fresh.
rohlik_group_l2_news.expansion: New automated warehouse in Munich, DE market doubling YoY.
rohlik_group_l2_news.workflow_ai_evidence: Using AI for demand forecasting and delivery routing.
rohlik_group_l2_news.growth_signals: Headcount grew 30% YoY. Munich warehouse expansion.

rohlik_group_l2_signals.leadership_team: CEO: Tomas Cupr, COO: New hire from Amazon (2025), CTO: Internal promotion
rohlik_group_l2_signals.ai_transformation_roles: Hiring: ML Engineer, Data Scientist, AI Product Manager
rohlik_group_l2_signals.other_hiring_signals: 100+ open roles across DE, CZ. Heavy engineering hiring.
rohlik_group_l2_signals.regulatory_pressure: EU Digital Markets Act, food safety regulations
rohlik_group_l2_signals.employee_sentiment: Glassdoor 3.8/5, positive on innovation culture, concerns about pace

tomas_cupr_profile.career_highlights: Founded Rohlik in 2014, previously co-founded Slevomat (acquired by Secret Escapes). Serial entrepreneur.
tomas_cupr_profile.thought_leadership: Regular speaker at European tech conferences. Forbes Czech 40 under 40.

tomas_cupr_signals.ai_champion_evidence: Publicly stated AI as core competitive advantage. Driving AI-first warehouse automation.
tomas_cupr_signals.authority_signals: Founder-CEO, controls strategic direction and budget. Board seat.
tomas_cupr_signals.budget_signals: Controls Series E allocation. EUR 170M to deploy.
tomas_cupr_signals.pain_indicators: Scaling automation across multiple markets. Last-mile delivery costs.
tomas_cupr_signals.buying_signals: Evaluating warehouse robotics vendors. Active on AI tooling.
